metadata.synopsis: A mother, Meem Grayling, and her son Deval beg on the street for enough cash to feed at least one of them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the mother & son duo around the stair close by Felogyr fireworks.

0.speaker: Glorissima
0.text: Please, kind saer, can you spare a few coins to feed my son? He's sick and likely to die!
